name: Outbreak!
description:
The outbreak is here!

Place your mouse in the center of the screen and get ready to move your individual around the quarantine zone to avoid the contagion for as long as possible. Use critical items like toilet paper and hand sanitizer to protect yourself. Each sanitary power-up protects you from one infection strike for that round.

Music Copyright: Bryant Lowry, Licensed through Soundstripe.

Inspired By: https://www.washingtonpost.com/graphics/2020/world/corona-simulator/
